birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省湘西土家族苗族自治州古丈县岩头寨镇老寨村

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国苗族女歌唱家，中国共产党党员。曾任中国人民解放军海军政治工作部文工团团长、中国音乐家协会副主席，是第九届全国人大代表，第十届、十一届、十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: A Chinese female singer of Miao ethnicity and a member of the Chinese Communist Party. She formerly served as the head of the Song and Dance Troupe of the Political Work Department of the People's Liberation Army Navy and vice-chairman of the Chinese Musicians' Association. She was a delegate to the 9th National People's Congress and a member of the 10th, 11th, and 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国电视制片人，宋祖英的丈夫。
description.en: Chinese television producer, husband of Song Zuying.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员，宋祖英的妹妹。
description.en: Chinese actress, younger sister of Song Zuying.

description.zh-cn: 美术工作者，宋祖英的弟弟。
description.en: Art worker, younger brother of Song Zuying.

description.zh-cn: 中国音乐教育家，宋祖英的老师。
description.en: Chinese music educator, teacher of Song Zuying.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的音乐专业高等学府。
description.en: A higher education institution for music located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军海军政治工作部文工团

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军政治工作部文工团

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军的文艺团体。
description.en: The cultural troupe of the People's Liberation Army Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族音乐家组成的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization composed of musicians of all ethnic groups in China.

nodes.id: 第九届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第九届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第九届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 9th National People's Congress, the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第十届全国委员会。
description.en: The 10th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

description.en: The 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第十二届全国委员会。
description.en: The 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省湘西土家族苗族自治州下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Xiangxi Tujia and Miao Autonomous Prefecture, Hunan Province, China.

nodes.id: 中国中央电视台春节联欢晚会

zh-cn: 中国中央电视台春节联欢晚会

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台为庆祝农历新年于每年除夕晚间举办的综艺性文艺晚会。
description.en: A variety show produced by China Central Television (CCTV) and broadcast on the eve of Chinese New Year.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙歌剧演唱家。
description.en: Spanish opera singer.

description.zh-cn: 2008年在中国北京举行的夏季奥林匹克运动会。
description.en: The Summer Olympic Games held in Beijing, China in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 2010年在中国上海举行的世界博览会。
description.en: The World Expo held in Shanghai, China in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员、导演、电影监制。
description.en: Hong Kong actor, director, and film producer.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的多功能体育馆。
description.en: A multi-purpose stadium in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾男歌手、音乐人、演员。
description.en: Taiwanese male singer, musician, and actor.

description.zh-cn: 台湾男歌手、音乐人、演员、导演。
description.en: Taiwanese male singer, musician, actor, and director.

description.zh-cn: 中国电视节目主持人、媒体人、企业家。
description.en: Chinese television host, media personality, and entrepreneur.

description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲的社会主义国家，为宋祖英的国籍国。
description.en: A socialist state in Asia, which is Song Zuying's country of nationality.

description.zh-cn: 中国的少数民族之一。
description.en: One of the ethnic minorities in China.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英与罗浩于1992年结婚。
description.en: Song Zuying and Luo Hao married in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 宋佳玲是宋祖英的妹妹。
description.en: Song Jialing is Song Zuying's younger sister.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖荣是宋祖英的弟弟。
description.en: Song Zurong is Song Zuying's younger brother.

degree.zh-cn: 民族声乐专业毕业，艺术学博士学位
degree.en: Graduated in Ethnic Vocal Music, Doctor of Arts degree

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英毕业于中国音乐学院民族声乐专业，并获得艺术学博士学位。
description.en: Song Zuying graduated from the China Conservatory of Music, majoring in Ethnic Vocal Music, and obtained a Doctor of Arts degree.

description.zh-cn: 1988年10月，宋祖英被“金龙杯”全国歌手邀请赛评委金铁霖教授收为学生。
description.en: In October 1988, Song Zuying was accepted as a student by Professor Jin Tielin, a judge at the 'Golden Dragon Cup' National Singer Invitational Competition.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英于1999年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Song Zuying joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1999.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军政治工作部文工团

description.zh-cn: 2013年至2018年，宋祖英担任中国人民解放军海军政治工作部文工团团长。
description.en: From 2013 to 2018, Song Zuying served as the head of the Song and Dance Troupe of the Political Work Department of the PLA Navy.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英曾担任中国音乐家协会副主席。
description.en: Song Zuying served as the Vice Chairman of the Chinese Musicians' Association.

relationships.target: 第九届全国人民代表大会
中国人民政治协商会议第十届全国委员会
中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会
中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会
中国中央电视台春节联欢晚会

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英自1990年起连续24年登上中央电视台春节联欢晚会的舞台进行表演。
description.en: Starting from 1990, Song Zuying performed on the CCTV Spring Festival Gala for 24 consecutive years.

description.zh-cn: 2008年8月24日，宋祖英与普拉西多·多明哥在北京奥运会闭幕式现场共同演唱了主题歌《爱的火焰》。
description.en: On August 24, 2008, Song Zuying and Plácido Domingo performed the theme song 'The Flame of Love' together at the closing ceremony of the Beijing Olympic Games.

description.zh-cn: 2008年8月7日，宋祖英担任北京奥运会火炬手；8月24日，在闭幕式上演唱主题歌。
description.en: On August 7, 2008, Song Zuying was a torchbearer for the Beijing Olympics; on August 24, she performed the theme song at the closing ceremony.

description.zh-cn: 2010年4月30日，宋祖英与成龙在上海世博会开幕式上共同演唱歌曲。
description.en: On April 30, 2010, Song Zuying and Jackie Chan sang a song together at the opening ceremony of the Shanghai Expo.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英在2010年上海世博会开幕式上进行演唱表演。
description.en: Song Zuying performed at the opening ceremony of the Expo 2010 in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 2011年5月8日，宋祖英在台北小巨蛋个人演唱会上与周华健同台演出。
description.en: On May 8, 2011, Song Zuying performed on the same stage with Wakin Chau at her solo concert at the Taipei Arena.

description.zh-cn: 2011年5月8日，宋祖英在台北小巨蛋个人演唱会上与周杰伦同台演出。
description.en: On May 8, 2011, Song Zuying performed on the same stage with Jay Chou at her solo concert at the Taipei Arena.

description.zh-cn: 2007年，宋祖英接受杨澜主持的电视节目《天下女人》的访问。
description.en: In 2007, Song Zuying was interviewed by Yang Lan on her TV show 'Her Village'.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英的国籍是中华人民共和国。
description.en: Song Zuying's nationality is the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 宋祖英的民族是苗族。
description.en: Song Zuying's ethnicity is Miao.
